meanings.definition: A farm implement used to break up and loosen soil beneath the surface.
meanings.sent1: The farmer used subsoilers to prepare the land for planting.
meanings.sent2: The subsoilers helped improve the soil quality on the farm.
meanings.sent3: The subsoilers had a party in the field after a hard day's work.
meanings.sent4: The subsoilers were like diligent gardeners, tending to the earth below.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the subsoilers at work was a symphony of soil rejuvenation.

meanings.definition: Those who operate or work with subsoilers.
meanings.sent1: The subsoilers were skilled workers who knew the land well.
meanings.sent2: The subsoilers took pride in their ability to improve soil quality.
meanings.sent3: The subsoilers joked about starting a band called 'The Soil Breakers'.
meanings.sent4: The subsoilers were the unsung heroes of the farm, toiling underground.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of the subsoilers was evident in the flourishing crops above ground.
